name: capricornus
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a constellation (= a group of stars) said to look like a goat with a fish's tail: Deneb Algedi is a star at the northeastern end of Capricornus. Compare
Capricorn
More examplesFewer examplesLater in the evening, the bluish disk of Neptune can be seen in Capricornus the Sea-Goat.Uranus and Neptune, which stand 14 degrees apart in the constellation Capricornus.
